response_variants: Since you have no symptoms and have not been exposed to COVID-19, no further action is required.
outcomes.name: progress_no_symptoms_cases_DETDUP_progress_no_symptoms_cases__check-test-EQ-no-exposure-no-symptoms

response_variants: Concerning your rash, if you are having trouble breathing, your face is throat is tight, or your face is swelling up, call emergency. Use warm (not hot) water to clean the area (without scrubbing). If this was potentially the result of a product, stop using it immediately. Try a medicated lotion on the area.
outcomes.name: diagnose_regular_sickness_DETDUP_diagnose_regular_sickness__check-test-EQ-rash-under

response_variants: Concerning your rash, contact your health care provider. Before you go, take mental note of when the rash began, what products you have been using recently/any possible insect bites, and what made it better/worse.
outcomes.name: diagnose_regular_sickness_DETDUP_diagnose_regular_sickness__check-test-EQ-rash-over

response_variants: To address your teeth, I sent you an email detailing the nearest appointments of dentists in your area.
outcomes.name: diagnose_regular_sickness_DETDUP_diagnose_regular_sickness__check-test-EQ-teeth

response_variants: Since you have had COVID-19 in the last 30 days or less, testing is not recommended as you have no covid symptoms.
outcomes.name: determine_covid_test_DETDUP_determine_covid_test__check-test-EQ-have-no-symptoms-30

response_variants: Since you have covid symptoms and have had COVID-19 in the last 30 days or less, you should use antigen tests according to the suggested testing guidelines.
outcomes.name: determine_covid_test_DETDUP_determine_covid_test__check-test-EQ-have-symptoms-30

response_variants: Since you have covid symptoms and have not had COVID-19 in the last 90 days, you should test immediately. You can use either a PCR test or take antigen tests according to the suggested testing guidelines.
outcomes.name: determine_covid_test_DETDUP_determine_covid_test__check-test-EQ-have-symptoms-no-90

response_variants: Since you have covid symptoms and have had COVID-19 in the last 90 days, you should use antigen tests according to the suggested testing guidelines.
outcomes.name: determine_covid_test_DETDUP_determine_covid_test__check-test-EQ-have-symptoms-90

response_variants: Although you have had COVID-19 in the last 90 days and don't have covid symptoms, you should still use antigen tests according to the suggested testing guidelines.
outcomes.name: determine_covid_test_DETDUP_determine_covid_test__check-test-EQ-have-no-symptoms-90

response_variants: Although you don't have covid symptoms and have not had COVID-19 in the last 90 days, since it has been 5 days, you should test. You can use either a PCR test or take antigen tests according to the suggested testing guidelines.
outcomes.name: determine_covid_test_DETDUP_determine_covid_test__check-test-EQ-no-symptom-exposed-been-5

response_variants: Since you have been exposed to COVID-19 but are not yet showing covid symptoms, wait a total of 5 days since your exposure to test.
outcomes.name: determine_covid_test_DETDUP_determine_covid_test__check-test-EQ-no-symptom-exposed-less-5
